org.sipdroid.codecs

Interface Codec


  • public interface Codec
    Represents the basic interface to the Codec classes All codecs need to implement basic encode and decode capability Codecs which inherit from CodecBase only need to implement encode, decode and init

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • decode

        int decode(byte[] encoded,
         short[] lin,
         int size)
        Decode a linear pcm audio stream
        Parameters:
        encoded - The encoded audio stream
        lin - The linear pcm audio frame buffer in which to place the decoded stream
        size - The size of the encoded frame

      • encode

        int encode(short[] lin,
         int offset,
         byte[] alaw,
         int frames)
        Encode a linear pcm audio stream
        Parameters:
        lin - The linear stream to encode
        offset - The offset into the linear stream to begin
        encoded - The buffer to place the encoded stream
        size - the size of the linear pcm stream (in words)

      • samp_rate

        int samp_rate()
        The sampling rate for this particular codec

      • frame_size

        int frame_size()
        The audio frame size for this particular codec

      • init

        void init()
        Optionally used to initiallize the codec before any encoding or decoding

      • update

        void update()

      • close

        void close()
        Optionally used to free any resources allocated in init after encoding or decoding is complete

      • isEnabled

        boolean isEnabled()
        (implemented by CodecBase

        checks to see if the user has enabled the codec.

      • isLoaded

        boolean isLoaded()
        (implemented by CodecBase

        Checks to see if the binary library associated with the codec (if any) loaded OK.

      • setListPreference

        void setListPreference(ListPreference l)
        (implemented by CodecBase
        Parameters:
        l - The list preference controlling this Codec Used to add listeners for preference changes and update the codec parameters accordingly.
